verses.name: 1 Kings 7:5
verses.text: And all the doors and posts were square, with the windows: and light was against light in three ranks.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:6
verses.text: And he made a porch of pillars; the length thereof was fifty cubits, and the breadth thereof thirty cubits: and the porch was before them: and the other pillars and the thick beam were before them.

verses.name: 1 Kings 7:7
verses.text: Then he made a porch for the throne where he might judge, even the porch of judgment: and it was covered with cedar from one side of the floor to the other.
